title: ESTATE SECURITY ARCHITECTURE
subtitle: RESIDENTIAL & ASSET CONTINUITY
description: Long-term oversight and assurance for residences and estates, integrating life safety, systems governance, and operational continuity under compartmented execution.
longDescription: Most estates don't have a security system. They have security parts: cameras from one vendor, alarms from another, access control that isn't tied to anything, and a network that was never designed for consequence. When something happens, it turns into guesswork—alerts without verification, response without clarity, and a mess when you need answers. GreenJay builds estate security as a single architecture. Surveillance, access control, intrusion, life safety, communications, and command center workflows—engineered into a hardened network, tuned for signal over noise, and run with procedures your team can execute under pressure.

title: TSCM / ELECTRONIC THREAT PROTECTION
subtitle: RF & DEVICE ASSURANCE
description: Locate and validate hidden or unauthorized devices, baseline your RF environment, investigate anomalies, and document findings that support real decisions.
longDescription: Technical Surveillance Countermeasures (TSCM) is the rigorous process of verifying that sensitive spaces are free from covert technical surveillance, including audio, video, and data exfiltration devices. GreenJay positions this capability not as a commodity service, but as a critical layer of privacy assurance designed specifically for UHNW estates and high-stakes executive operations. Our method is doctrine-first and repeatable, ensuring that privacy is treated as a verified condition rather than an assumption. We operate with absolute discretion and minimal disruption to the principal's lifestyle or business tempo, integrating seamlessly with existing security details. While no environment can be guaranteed as impenetrable indefinitely, our verification process produces a level of confidence directly proportional to the scope of inspection and the access controls in place. Privacy verified, not assumed.

title: COUNTER-UAS INTEGRATION
subtitle: DETECT · VERIFY · ESCALATE
description: Detection coverage, verification, evidence capture, and escalation rules integrated into your estate operating picture. Fast classification and controlled response.
longDescription: Unmanned aerial systems introduce a new class of threat—fast, remote, anonymous, and increasingly accessible. Counter-UAS Integration embeds aerial threat detection into your existing estate security architecture. We establish detection zones, classification workflows, evidence capture, and escalation doctrine so that unknown aerial activity is treated as an operational event, not a surprise. Each contact is identified, verified, and routed through defined decision pathways. This transforms drone activity from ambiguity into governed intelligence—enabling calm, lawful, and controlled response without panic or overreach.
